channel.title: CoinSpice Milk
channel.itunes:subtitle: subtitle
channel.itunes:author: C. Edward Kelso
channel.itunes:summary: MILK, soothing crypto's burn, is a podcast hosted by C. Edward Kelso of CoinSpice, a feisty and fun crypto news organization. Listen for the very best in spicy cryptocurrency news, controversies, and guests.
channel.description: MILK, soothing crypto's burn, is a podcast hosted by C. Edward Kelso of CoinSpice, a feisty and fun crypto news organization. Listen for the very best in spicy cryptocurrency news, controversies, and guests.

item.itunes:title: Bitcoin Emperor: BTC Sucks, Only Stupid People Fall for That
item.title: Bitcoin Emperor: BTC Sucks, Only Stupid People Fall for That
item.itunes:author: C. Edward Kelso
item.itunes:summary: Bitcoin Emperor Daniel Krawisz is on fire in this episode of Milk, Soothing Crypto's Burn, flagship podcast for CoinSpice. Krawisz (pronounced Cray-Wits) describes his transition into supporting Bitcoin Cash (BCH), which he found a more vibrant, creative community after he was chastised by BTC cult members for even discussing BCH.
item.description: Bitcoin Emperor Daniel Krawisz is on fire in this episode of Milk, Soothing Crypto's Burn, flagship podcast for CoinSpice. Krawisz (pronounced Cray-Wits) describes his transition into supporting Bitcoin Cash (BCH), which he found a more vibrant, creative community after he was chastised by BTC cult members for even discussing BCH.
item.content:encoded: Bitcoin Emperor Daniel Krawisz is on fire in this episode of Milk, Soothing Crypto's Burn, flagship podcast for CoinSpice. Krawisz (pronounced Cray-Wits) describes his transition into supporting Bitcoin Cash (BCH), which he found a more vibrant, creative community after he was chastised by BTC cult members for even discussing BCH.

item.itunes:title: Vin Armani: I Know Satoshi Nakamoto's True Identity
item.title: Vin Armani: I Know Satoshi Nakamoto's True Identity
item.itunes:author: C. Edward Kelso
item.itunes:summary: Vin Armani of CoinText, Countermarkets, and the Showtime reality series Gigolos knows Satoshi Nakamoto's true identity. He discusses his research in-depth, and opens up about the importance of his groundbreaking platform CoinText to allow peer-to-peer digital cash to take over the world. Don't miss this episode.
item.description: Vin Armani of CoinText, Countermarkets, and the Showtime reality series Gigolos knows Satoshi Nakamoto's true identity.
